website_summaries.verdict: The Simple Chef HF-898 is a perfectly respectable air fryer, but like other air fryers, it doesn't offer much more than the common toaster oven.
pros: Simple Chef's air fryer was the most affordable cooker we tested, and one of the easiest to keep clean, too
cons: None of the food cooked in the Simple Chef air fryer blew us away, and none of it came anywhere close to deep-fried indulgence

customer_reviews.title: Started melting after 1 1/2 months of use!
customer_reviews.text: I got my air fryer a month and a half ago and loved it! I made delicious potatoes, crispy chickpeas, tofu, chicken nuggets and tons of other stuff. Unfortunately, I just noticed that it has started to melt on the bottom. I am super bummed and can't believe this would happen so quickly after buying it! Do yourself a favor and buy a better quality air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA

customer_reviews.title: Could of burned my house down
customer_reviews.text: The fan stopped working and overheated the machine after maybe using only 5 times. I came back after 15 minutes to find it melted and about to catch on fire . Very dangerous
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I am so happy that I did
customer_reviews.text: My family has been wanting an air fryer for some time now, but weren't sure how well they would work. I decided to go ahead and try this one out, and I am so happy that I did. I can't get over that I can make french fries with a tablespoon of oil-- and they come out so crispy and delicious! I can't wait to try out all kinds of recipes with this appliance, and have been very impressed so far. I really recommend this air fryer to anyone who is wanting the crunch, but needs their food to be healthier than traditional fried treats.
customer_reviews.author: Chouser

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Got this air fryer for Christmas from my husband, so for 4 months, the handle where there is “metal” is rusty. The Teflon stuff is flaking off on the basket and basin, keeping in mind that this appliance is not used ever day, I don’t feel like it should be in this shape. I would not recommend this product to anyone. The food that I have cooked in it has been good but the product itself is obviously junk due to its poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: brian edmonds

customer_reviews.title: We loved it. It's works awesome and we enjoyed using ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband's birthday gift. We loved it. It's works awesome and we enjoyed using it. We use it about 1-2 times per week. I bought it in October of 2017 and 2 months later, the coating is coming off of the basket. I do not know if this is an industry wide issue with other brands of Air Fryers? or if it is just related to the Simple Chef brand. I have enjoyed the product so far, but this was a lot of money to spend for only 2 months worth of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jenbadabing

customer_reviews.title: Great for the 3-4 months it worked - Unresponsive Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is my first negative Amazon review. We loved this Air Fryer until it stopped working correctly after less than 4 months. I emailed the company and they didn’t bother to respond. The basket no longer locks into the fryer so it will not run. You have the choice of holding it closed or using a piece of duct tape. Not exactly what I expected when I bought it. So my advice is to buy from a different company who may actually care about their products. The fact that they didn’t even respond to my email says a lot about the company.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ann

customer_reviews.title: Paint on your food
customer_reviews.text: After having this air fryer for two months I noticed a few black dots on my food which happened to be paint from the metal basket.... my advice is get one that does not melt or put your health at risk. I rather eat McDonald's every day than getting cancer from these chemicals. #Update: I cannot believe this still have 5 stars... enjoy consuming paint
customer_reviews.author: C. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about purchasing this product. Received the product quickly, but opened it after a week and tried chicken wings for the first time. Came out very well. Wings cooked well and tasted delicious. I would recommend this product to anyone. This is very affordable price product. However, I saw this product $10 chepaer in homedepot. But, don't want to go over return process etc...Would love if Amazon had price match option.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnu

customer_reviews.title: just use your oven instead
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine but I was not impressed. According to the instructions you're supposed to place a single layer of fries in the basket. That's like maybe one serving at a time. I was not keen on the concept of "shaking" the basket often while cooking either. I was really hoping the chicken fingers and fries would taste fried, but they tasted exactly like when I bake them in the oven. It did clean up well and is dishwasher safe, so that's a plus. But I'm just going to continue baking my fries in the oven. Quicker, easier, larger capacity, and just as good if not better
customer_reviews.author: houndmama

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, easy, and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I've been cooking so many things with this little guy. Raw burgers, Raw Turkey, Raw chicken, frozen cheese sticks, frozen orange chicken, reheating old pizza, and more. The best part is, it's dishwasher safe. I just throw the pieces in the dishwasher and it's ready to go again the next day if needed. Can't wait to make and bake more stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Alanis

customer_reviews.title: Great fryer but takes getting used to.
customer_reviews.text: So for the price and what it accomplishes, I'm happy. It takes getting used to, because every time you try something new to eat you have to learn it because you're not really following fry instructions but not convection oven's either. The plastic smell takes a while to go away but when it does it's great to cook with, and the tray clean up is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sascha

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and used it for around 10 times and it suddenly stopped working as the air won't circulate anymore. 1 month and it is over. I haven't found on their website about the warranty whatsoever. The light shows that the air fryer is heating, the timer also works, spins and make a ticking noise but there isn't any air circulating.
customer_reviews.author: Lauro Machado

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean up
customer_reviews.text: Fish without the heavy oil or fish smell in the air, that’s what I noticed right away after cooking with our new hot air fryer. Cooked perfectly, no mess or hot oil to clean up afterwards. Easy to clean the fryer basket and ready for the next time to use our new hot air fryer. If you follow the directions you can’t over cook because of the fryer timer. Anyone want to buy my deep fryer?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy To Use!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience with an air fryer, and I am not disappointed! It is so easy to use and clean. We have had this about a month and a half, and have NO problems whatsoever. I am vegan so I have only made fries with it (both processed/frozen as well as from pre-boiled potatoes), but my husband has enjoyed it for chicken tenders, chicken patties, hamburgers, egg rolls, and who knows what else. He was very iffy on me buying it, but he was a convert immediately! I do not use any oil whatsoever and find that you really don't need it- not even just a small bit. This might be my favorite purchase on 2017.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: So far - we love it! The extent of our cooking has included ...
customer_reviews.text: So far - we love it! The extent of our cooking has included grilled cheese sandwiches, frozen to meal ready breaded chicken tenders, and warming up takeout food. All turn out excellent in this machine! Next up is homemade french fries. For the ease of use and simplicity, I would recommend this product. I am more at ease with my high school and junior high aged kids using this instead of the oven to warm up or cook their food. It also cleans up easily - another added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Too bad it didn't last...
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for maybe just over a year. Average use, not even once a week. Now it won't work. The air flow in it blows so hard, it flings everything around. I used to love making my son cheese quesadillas. I'd put a flour tortilla in and top with cheese, melt the cheese, fold in half and serve. Now it blows the tortilla and cheese all over and makes a huge mess. It also doesn't cook evenly anymore. Too bad I it only lasted about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Helps in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I havn’t cooked any main dishes with this yet, but I use it to cook my sausage while my stove has other items cooking. I like that it cuts off on its own and is self contained. I did attempt cooking wings in it when I first got it but they were so so, kind of bland compared to regular frying. Plus I had to keep cooking them over and over. This was about 12 wings. This cooker seems better with one to two pieces of an item. I need to experiment more with it.
customer_reviews.author: ValP

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. Unfortunately, it was delivered in its original box, so the UPS man handed him his gift 2 weeks early. It also had a small crack in the plastic, which didn’t affect the usage, so my husband just decided to keep it. Other than those two things- he is obsessed and has used it every day since it arrived. Onion rings, wings, egg rolls, fries- everything crisps is amazing with no oil! Super happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. W

customer_reviews.title: Simple Chef, we hardly knew you
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less than 5 months. Not only did it just die while running, even the MECHANICAL timer quit as well. Seems to me that means it pretty much cooked itself inside.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rankin

customer_reviews.title: If you love fries and onion rings
customer_reviews.text: I have not much to add to the rave reviews of this product. If you love fries and onion rings, this is the machine. Clean up is a breeze. One thing to be careful about. There is a spring loaded release on the basket which frees it from the base. I dropped the base twice thinking it would still be supported. Dumb mistake but I made it twice. My greatest challenge is not gaining weight because it is so easy to toss in fries with every other meal.
customer_reviews.author: Terrapin Station

customer_reviews.title: I'm giving it 2 stars because I enjoyed the meals that I made in it but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor, don't get this one. I'm giving it 2 stars because I enjoyed the meals that I made in it but the only problem was that the pan/door of the air fryer was hard to close. It worked great the first and second time and from the third time onwards, I had to keep pushing it in because it would continuously pop out, and if the door isn't shut properly, the food will not cook. I tried several times to make it work but it became so frustrating and I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kendor

customer_reviews.title: Try it--- It's Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today and made some amazing homemade french fries! They were crispy and perfectly done, using less than 1 and 1/2 tsp. of oil for one large potato---enough for 2 of us to eat! Of course, they were so yummy we could've eaten more. Can't wait to try other things in the Simple Chef Air Fryer. BTW, basket and tray are very easy to clean as well. Extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CHK

customer_reviews.title: How simple and how great
customer_reviews.text: I am so surprised at how this is so great. Actually was very hesitant to get another small appliance but had been eying them for sometime. It came today and I could not wait to try it. As always I tried making it complicated, but it was soooo easy. My first tiptoe into it, I cooked two potatoes and they were terrific. First time I have had "French fries " in forever and they more than met my expectations. Cannot wait to try any and everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R.

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks! I threw away my grease fryer.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. The only downside I would say is the size. It's great for doing one item of dinner in it, but if you plan to do fish and chips, you'll need two at this size or the larger one. But, the taste is awesome and it does cook everything we have tried in it very crispy. You really can't tell the difference aside from the food missing that nasty taste of grease that isn't brand new. I bought the other accessories for it and have been nothing but happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G Bass

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever air fryer. I love it! Cooks my food just like it’s been fried and leaves the food moist and tender. The only thing I do not like about this product is the handle won’t latch into the pan correctly and food is getting stuck to the basket part. I’ve had for a month now, so I’m disappointed those features didn’t last long. But otherwise works well.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: it comes pretty darn close
customer_reviews.text: As a medical student and an overweight 40 year old, this air fryer is a really neat device. I have so far made chips from sliced russet potatoes, fries from russet potatoes, tofu with a panko crumb breading, mozzarella sticks with panko crust, and wings with a dry rub seasoning. Whiel things don't have quite the crunch of fried, it comes pretty darn close. Oh, also vegetables of all stripes are delicious in it too! Air-fried brussels sprouts which have been tossed with a little olive oil came out tender inside with crispy outer leaves. Delicious! Highly recommend this device!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine S.

customer_reviews.title: Makes awesome tofu!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I made tofu and it came out better than ever, and so much easier than how I’m used to cooking it.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Five months in it's peeling like crazy! I'm not even sure if it's still ...
customer_reviews.text: Five months in it's peeling like crazy! I'm not even sure if it's still safe to use. That said, it performs well. It cooks small amounts of food so it's suitable for 2 people or a small family. I'd recommend going for a different brand that will last longer than 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite small kitchen appliance!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this air fryer and it was VERY affordable. It's fantastically easy to clean. So far, I have used it for wings, fried chicken, french fries (both frozen & from "scratch"), Hasselback potatoes (boy 'o boy) and grilled cheese. Today I did "hard boiled" eggs in it. What's not to love? P.S. Perfect hard-boiled eggs: Put on eggs rack accessory @ 250 degrees 15-16 minutes. Place in ice water bath til cool & peel. Easy-Peazy!
customer_reviews.author: Old Woman

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! I am in love!! Used it first night that I got it and made best Old Bay chicken legs and potatoes! Best part...no greasy food! Using again to make frozen breaded cod filled and frozen fresh cut fries! This is a great air fryer and soooo easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within days of receiving as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this about 6 or 7 times. Got for Christmas. Was making some tofu, and the lights went out...and the machine won't turn on again. A total waste of money. I will never buy another Simple Chef product again. If I could give this zero stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: HelenN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! Homemade fries in under 20 min, and only using 1/2 tsp oil! Highly recommend this product. I bought the manual vs digital, which was 20 bucks cheaper- Works great!!! After sharing multiple recipes on fb, I'm pretty sure atleast 5 of my friends bought one :)
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: After 4 months liner started to peel
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first, I used it a lot until the non stick coating started to peel off. The basket still has most of the coating, but the inside of the cooker on the bottom all of the coating is off. Never put in dishwasher. Always let hot sudsy water soak in it for 1/2 hour before cleaning. Drippings stuck to the bottom from the very beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry K. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Its just ok, has a smell
customer_reviews.text: ive had this for a couple months now... and it still has a strong chemical smell every time i use it. Don't know if that's very safe. Also its hard to determine how long to cook anything. I have to constantly check on the food.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: There maybe better ones out there for same or lesser price, but I’m good. I use it mostly to air fry veggies, which taste better than steamed and just as no hassles.
customer_reviews.author: PKMAN

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly useful gadget
customer_reviews.text: A relative told me how much she loved her air fryer & recommended I try one. I’m not really into kitchen gadgets, already got stuff I never use but I bought this on a whim while browsing Amazon. I used it right away & happily admit that I love it. I have cooked all my meats in it & some vegetables. Have had to adjust cook times but I love how the food comes out. Best of all is the clean up is not cumbersome. I cook mostly for 2 so this purchase is perfect size. I’ve been contemplating getting a larger size to use when girls are visiting.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Lee

customer_reviews.title: AND SHE COULDNT BELIEVE HOW EASY TO USE AND NO MESS
customer_reviews.text: READ SOME LITERATURE AND DECIDED TO GET FOR US AS A BIRTHDAY PRESENT FOR MY WIFE, AND SHE COULDNT BELIEVE HOW EASY TO USE AND NO MESS ,RECOMMENDED TO OUR FRIEND AND THEY HAVE ALSO PURCHASED FOR THEIR USE. WAITING FOR AIR FRYER COOK BOOK ALSO ORDERED THRU AMAZON..SO MANY THINGS WE WANT TO COOK IN IT.
customer_reviews.author: tito

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use and I highly recommend getting the accessories to add versatility. We make roasted veggies from freezer to plate in 15 minutes without having to heat up the house with the big oven. The chicken strips are crispy on the outside and juicy and tender on the inside. I love this and sent it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: . Stopped working with no fix that worksafter 5 months. Paint peels off easily. They don't tell you but the entire interior gets coated with grease if you cook meats or chicken . The burner, the fan and all aqround them gets covered in smelly grease. Very hard to get at to clean, too. Don't know if they are all like that. cleaned it as well as possible but it remains dead.
customer_reviews.author: N. R. Gawlak

customer_reviews.title: So far both fish and pork chops are so easy and have a great flavor without deep frying
customer_reviews.text: So far both fish and pork chops are so easy and have a great flavor without deep frying! Easy to clean - short cooking time, just look up recipes for air frying and get started!!!
customer_reviews.author: lgt

customer_reviews.title: Inspect your box
customer_reviews.text: This product was opened before I opened it. I wasn't pleased at all as that is a big no no.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelymom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap/works great
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this is a game changer. I put it on the counter, and throw stuff in, and it comes out delicious. Chicken wings, frozen eggrolls, avocado slides! It's kind of a hassle to clean out, but it's so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy! Great price and reliable so far!
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted an air fryer and I didn't expect great quality because of the price. Bought this cheap one to try air frying, assuming I would buy a better one if we liked it. No need to buy a better one.this one has been great! We use it a lot and we're very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Couture

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only a year.
customer_reviews.text: After a year, it stopped working and customer service appears non existent. I expect appliances to last Longer than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Una Smit

customer_reviews.title: Request additional shipping box for this item.
customer_reviews.text: Item purchased as a specific requested gift based on online reviews, so I don't know if recipient will be satisfied with how it cooks. Looks nice, comes with instruction manual. Shipping was fast and appliance arrived undamaged despite several rips and tears on two sides from rough handling. Would suggest improved protection of original box.
customer_reviews.author: jammac

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been thinking about buying an air fryer for a while after trying my mother in law’s. I’m so glad I did! I made chicken wings and French fries on the first night , and was able to make a fairly quick hassle free dinner. It’s really easy to use and to clean. I would recommend this product to everyone, it’s really a kitchen essential.
customer_reviews.author: Bianj

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and as represented-a NICE cooking method alternative
customer_reviews.text: Unpacked, washed and used within minutes. Of course I started out by making home-made French fries and they were delicious. Clean up was extremely easy. I actually just used some spray olive oil rather than the recommended amount of oil and they still turned out brown and crispy and all I had to do to clean was just wipe down with a damp paper towel. I'm excited to try other recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: timer stopped working
customer_reviews.text: When I received my air fryer I fell in love with it! BYE BYE stovetop. And then it happened, got ready to use my fryer and the spring had stopped working in the timer. Without the timer it doesn't run so I had to part with my love. Looking for a new one without the spring.
customer_reviews.author: susan mize

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: First Air Fryer I've ever owned so I'm still learning how to use it. It's nice to be able to make a small batch of French fries without messing with oil. Love how easy it is to clean. The simple mechanical time seems well built and works perfectly. No need to remember complicated instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz The Cat

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I loved that it contained no oil, the chicken wings, popcorn chicken, and cheese sticks we made were crispy, no smell or smoke, and the clean up was so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Lilabells mom

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Great product exactly as advertised. I would order this item again. Great experience with this seller. Buy from this seller with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Heaton

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty cool appliance
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool appliance. I love that I can have crispy food without using oil and having a greasy mess to clean up. I also love that the basket and bowl are dishwasher safe. Can't wait to use it more. There are lots of recipes you can find for the Air Fryer besides the common deep-fried foods. The handle on top makes it easy to move. I was suprised at all it can do. Very happy with this Air Fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Bonds

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Healthy way to get crispy food
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Healthy way to get crispy food, works as described. I found adding a little bit of oil even if it doesn't specify is a good way to go. Also make sure you dry your chicken with a paper towel before you fry!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Neil

customer_reviews.title: Loved at first, but seriously dangerous craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: A year in, the fan stopped working. This could have started a fire. Dangerous product, so not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C Woolery

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love love love my air fryer! It's quick, it's easy, and cleanup is a snap. However, the description says that the basket and bowl are dishwasher safe. The chrome look handle on the bowl lost its sheen and discolored the first time I put it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Unusable...we were sent a product that was completely crooked.
customer_reviews.text: Latch was so crooked the machine didn't close properly, and there was no documentation in the box. We have a friend who owns this machine and loves it, but the quality control on the boxed products seems to be shotty.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mcrae

customer_reviews.title: Simple is BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. The turn dials are the best features. You just quickly turn time and temp. You don't have to hit the up or down button 50 times to get the temp or time you want. I thought I needed to upgrade to the "oven" model. This one is better! Takes forever to get the time and temp that I want. I was going to give this away. Nope I find myself reaching for this one all the time. Super east to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Huntley

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Economical to buy. Just to put a veggie burger in for 15 minutes, comes out to perfection, and crispy egg rolls in minutes.....love it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B. Massey

customer_reviews.title: Loved it then it quit working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was amazing until after 4 months it completely stopped working. It started around 3 months to take a few times of jiggling the handle for it to come on. And then last week right at about 4 months it would not turn on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dorsett

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a family
customer_reviews.text: This fryer is practically useless. The interior is large but doesn't have baskets on different levels. This means you have to make several batches. It's not on our counter anymore
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Uricoechea

customer_reviews.title: Love it! So far we've made porkchops
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So far we've made porkchops, empanadas, bagels, and chicken nuggets and they've all come out delicious! The only thing is you have to cook the food in batches because the basket isn't that big but the less food you put in the basket each time, the faster it cooks. Not a mess to clean either. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product! You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this product! You will not regret it. Quick, easy clean up, crisps up the food like nothing else can. I use mine so much it is the only appliance on my kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley K.

customer_reviews.title: why are you reading these still.. BUY NOW
customer_reviews.text: this changed my life. Chicken Nugget trays are a thing of the past.. (THE FUTURE IS NOW!) makes great crispy outside and normally heats all the way through.. but don't add greasy food.. it then become a smoldering egg from hell.. it was actually kinda scary. we lost the cat.. BUT used correctly its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: bry

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this air fryer. It's super easy to use and the flavors of the food we make are incredible. There's a plethora of things you can make in it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! It doesn't even taste "healthy!" I love it! Makes amazing wings, fries, everything!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use, tasty cooking.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 85 year old mom because there aren't a lot of bells and whistles to confuse her. She loves it and uses it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer rocks!!! It works so well for fries/tater tots/nuggets. I’m not sure that it would hold enough food for more than 2/3 people but it works great for snacks. I love this product and use it weekly, if not more often!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but isn't strong
customer_reviews.text: I love using this thing, its simple and makes very good food. However after a month or so of pretty heavy use, every day or three, the pan sometimes come undone from the shaker part while shaking, causing all the crumbs or grease or whatever to go everywhere. It is very frustrating but it has been worth the 5 or so tunes that's happened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and hash browns and all of it has turned out perfect. Easy to use and everything comes out super ...
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this! So far we have done Chicken wings, bacon, and hash browns and all of it has turned out perfect. Easy to use and everything comes out super crispy and delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Unit
customer_reviews.text: The item works well and seems pretty solid. The basket is much bigger than I was expecting. The unit heats nicely and evenly. The cookbook that comes with it is nice, but limited, A simple Google search will give you a lot of recipes and ideas. For the price you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work, no instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box, plugged it in. No lights, no instructions, no power. Really crappy issue considering I had no way to know if I was doing something wrong. Who sends something like this with no instructions?
customer_reviews.author: russell bell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a few days, so have just tried it a couple of times with french fries and battered/panko onion rings so far. Both turned out great! I was amazed at how crispy the onion rings were! It has been easy to use and easy to clean. I bought an air fryer cookbook, and plan to work my way through it!
customer_reviews.author: TKL

customer_reviews.title: Bad gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom she really wanted an air fryer and she hates it. She said it takes way too long to cook anything and it doesn't come out good.
customer_reviews.author: Nate C

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely top quality. I love using a fraction of oil or butter to quickly air fry fries, nuggets, egg rolls. I look forward to see if I can fry up empanadas and flautas in this too.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Villasmil

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this air fryer and would highly recommend it EXCEPT for that the first one we received was cracked in the box and the replacement has a crack in the handle after only two weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: So Happy I bought this - have used it almost everynight ...
customer_reviews.text: So Happy I bought this - have used it almost everynight for the past 2 weeks makes moist pork chops which I have never been able to achieve any other way Also like to make a vegetable mix of red pepper zuchini butternut squash and purple onion No oil just a little Mrs. Dash for seasoning and it comes out amazing I pack that vegetable mix in my lunch each day This fryer makes eating healthy fun Plus when you are dieting it is great to have more food options that are not high in calories because of cooking with oil
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Rubino

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: So far I've experimented with making bacon, coconut shrimp, and crispy chicken. All came out good. I didn't use any oil but people say you can but I feel it would cause smokiness. I love how simple it is to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Belledonna Rosario

customer_reviews.title: The french fries come out great!! I am working on trying it with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I had hoped. The french fries come out great!! I am working on trying it with other things still but happy already with how fast it heats up~
customer_reviews.author: Sjwcslook

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I bought this on Nov 2017. July 2018, everything I put in sticks and 22 minutes suggested to cook it is not enough. I have to over cook for 30 min or 400°. I won't recommend at all. I don't even use it anymore. Everything get stick in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeysi

customer_reviews.title: Paint chips off
customer_reviews.text: The air fryer is great except when the black paint chips off and gets stuck on the food. Then it gets rusty where the paint chipped off at.
customer_reviews.author: Frasier

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  A must have.
customer_reviews.text: First time using an Air Fryer I made french fries. Crispy and tasty. Very easy. Next I tried chicken. Bought 4 thighs, seasoned and started the Air Fryer. They came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LV Artist

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Its good for small family. So far I made Avocado with egg, bacon and cheese in it. Wrapped asparagus and chicken nuggets and frozen french fries.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Can’t fill basket with food like pictures suggest
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to clean. Works well but pictures it shows of full to the brim fries and stuff is untrue,, food will never cook properly unless it’s single layer
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I gave this as a Christmas gift and the family ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Christmas gift and the family loves it. The kids (11 and 13)love making their own food in it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Nice look for kitchen countertop!
customer_reviews.text: My meatballs turned out perfect, going to test out sweet potatoes this weekend. I like the look and it is sized right for 2-3 people!
customer_reviews.author: jon seibert

customer_reviews.text: I personally did not like this air fryer. I know many people that do like it and use it. But I didn’t like how my food turned out in it. Very dry. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Alina BG

customer_reviews.title: Ease of cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far, air fried hamburgers (no grease - great); also crown tots they were nice and crisp. Just need to make note cards so I can remember how long I "cooked" each item!! Wish I had bought earlier when I first heard about air friers
customer_reviews.author: Janet M. Ivey-geer

customer_reviews.title: Simple Chef AF
customer_reviews.text: Product works great but, if you are going to cook for more then one or two you will want to buy a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick coating peeling off
customer_reviews.text: I use my air fryer almost daily. This air fryer does NOT hold up well under heavy usage. After about two months, the nonstick coating started peeling off until it became unusable. Using cheap nonstick coating is one of the ways of cutting manufacturing costs. It is apparent that Simple Chef cut corners and produced a low quality appliance. Also, manufacturer information is not available online and the seller was unresponsive when I contacted them for the manufacturer's information. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vveerryy simple to use. Only had it two days ...
customer_reviews.text: Vveerryy simple to use. Only had it two days and already have done hot wings, breaded okra and french fries. Everything was delicious. Never thought I'd buy one until I had french fries at a friends house made from one. Bought it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Greywolf

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about the air fryer but after using it for one week I can not imagine my kitchen without it. Amazing homemade French fries, home fries, southern fried chicken, fried summer squash and the best hamburgers! All with no grease. The clean up is so easy and no mess. It is just the right size for 2-4 people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this air fryer. Makes cooking easier and faster. Food tastes great. Very easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mattocks

customer_reviews.title: The best present ever! Product review on YouTube at malsworld
customer_reviews.text: Product review on YouTube MalsWorld SimpleChef Airfryer This is the best gift ever! Bought 2 of these for Christmas gifts, used both of them on Christmas day! We made fried okra, broccoli, salmon, and jalapenos stuffed with cream cheese and bacon! This is a perfect gift , easy to clean, and highly recommend for healthy eating!
customer_reviews.author: mallory schmitz

customer_reviews.title: I love them for quick and healthier meals
customer_reviews.text: This is my second identical air fryer. I love them for quick and healthier meals. Performs well and I have had no product concerns. Great Air Fryer offered at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: John Watkins

customer_reviews.title: ... fry french fries and the result was not as good as actually frying potatoes in oil
customer_reviews.text: I used it to fry french fries and the result was not as good as actually frying potatoes in oil. I use it for fry zucchini and it can fry one layer at a time, which is OK as it is for two persons, me and my wife. The other day I used it to fry frozen food and it was as good as frying in oil, so thumbs up for that. I need to keep using it and learn on trial and error approach.
customer_reviews.author: saman moshafi

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to operate. The outside gets warm, as expected, but it is not so hot that it would be a problem if touched by hand. Easy to clean. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Miles

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen appliance in my house
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen appliance in my house. This thing does everything!! I use this 1-2 times per week for chicken, shrimp, fries, etc. great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen device ever!
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing 7 days a week. My oven is jealous. We cook burgers and frys in it, and toss in the buns and they are toasted in 15 seconds. Paired with an Instant Pot you might not use a conventional cooking device again.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer works absolutely perfectly. The non-stick coating is truly non-stick. I have used this air fryer more than my oven!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I have 3 teens and this is a lifesaver. I hate greasy food but also hate soggy stuff so this is the perfect alternative. Fast, crispy and healthier
customer_reviews.author: SocalHortons

product_meta.title: Simple Chef Air Fryer - Air Fryer For Healthy Oil Free Cooking - 3.5 Liter Capacity w/Dishwasher Safe Parts
